attributes.action: To benefit from Stamp Duty Holiday if we accepted a mortgage offer before March
attributes.additional_details: Allow buyers to complete their purchase and take  advantage of the SDLT if they accepted a mortgage offer before March 31.
attributes.background:
Like many others, I have bought a new build. I recieved my mortgage offer back in June and I also exchanged contracts. My completion date is  March but there is a small chance it could  be delayed.
The Stamp duty extension has been denied so I have created a new proposal which I think is fair.
